member.summary: Check if the data is exist inside the datagrid
member.param: Datagrid where the data will be check.
(1) The column name (2) The key or value of primary key
The column to be check
The value of columns. NOTE: The length must be equal to the length of the column
To test if the module is in Insert or update mode
If true the function will check if all columns are required
member.returns: Boolean : True if exist else False
